failures.unauthenticated: Oops! You're not logged in. Please sign in to access this data.
failures.unauthorized: Uh-oh! You don't have permission to view this information. Please contact support if you believe this is a mistake.
failures.not_found: Oh dear! The data you're looking for couldn't be found. Double-check your input or try again later.
failures.client: Hold on! There's an issue with your device. Please check your connection and try again.
failures.server: Hold on! Our servers are currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.
failures.local_database: Apologies! Our database seems to be acting up. We're on it! Please try again later.
failures.unprocessable_entity: Oops! Something went wrong with the data you provided. Please check and try again.
failures.format: Sorry, there's an issue with the data format. Please ensure it matches the required format and try again.
failures.cache: We encountered a caching problem. Please refresh the page and try again.
failures.timeout: The request took too long to process. Please check your internet connection and try again.
failures.socket: We're facing some network issues. Please try again later.
failures.upload: Oops! There was an error while uploading your file. Please try again.
failures.permission: Sorry, you don't have the necessary permissions to perform this action.
failures.too_many_attempt: Oops! Slow down a bit. We received too many requests. Please try again after a while.
